summary: This is an email from August 13, 2019, regarding an 'After Action Memo' and an 'After Action Team' that will arrive in the morning. The sender apologizes for the attached memo not being in proper format and promises to have 'El' format it properly and provide a signed copy later in the week. The email is copied to the Regional Director of the Northeast Region.

events.title: Arrival of After Action Team
events.description: An 'After Action Team' is scheduled to arrive in the morning, as referenced in the memo.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 13, 2019, concerning an 'After Action Memo' and team.
An 'After Action Team' is expected to arrive the following morning (August 14, 2019).
The sender references having a staff member named 'El' reformat an improperly formatted attachment.
